# Available Rules

üîß Indicates that the rule is fixable, and using `--fix` option on the [command line](https://eslint.org/docs/user-guide/command-line-interface#fixing-problems) can automatically fix some of the reported problems.  
üí° Indicates that some problems reported by the rule are manually fixable by editor [suggestions](https://eslint.org/docs/developer-guide/working-with-rules#providing-suggestions).  
‚≠êÔ∏è Indicates that the rule is included in the `plugin:svelte/recommended` config.

## Possible Errors

These rules relate to possible syntax or logic errors in Svelte code:

| Rule ID                                                                                               | Description                                                                                                                            |       |
| :---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | :------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | :---- |
| [svelte/infinite-reactive-loop](./infinite-reactive-loop)                                             | Svelte runtime prevents calling the same reactive statement twice in a microtask. But between different microtask, it doesn't prevent. |       |
| [svelte/no-dom-manipulating](./no-dom-manipulating)                                                   | disallow DOM manipulating                                                                                                              |       |
| [svelte/no-dupe-else-if-blocks](./no-dupe-else-if-blocks)                                             | disallow duplicate conditions in `{#if}` / `{:else if}` chains                                                                         | ‚≠êÔ∏è   |
| [svelte/no-dupe-on-directives](./no-dupe-on-directives)                                               | disallow duplicate `on:` directives                                                                                                    |       |
| [svelte/no-dupe-style-properties](./no-dupe-style-properties)                                         | disallow duplicate style properties                                                                                                    | ‚≠êÔ∏è   |
| [svelte/no-dupe-use-directives](./no-dupe-use-directives)                                             | disallow duplicate `use:` directives                                                                                                   |       |
| [svelte/no-dynamic-slot-name](./no-dynamic-slot-name)                                                 | disallow dynamic slot name                                                                                                             | ‚≠êÔ∏èüîß |
| [svelte/no-export-load-in-svelte-module-in-kit-pages](./no-export-load-in-svelte-module-in-kit-pages) | disallow exporting load functions in `*.svelte` module in SvelteKit page components.                                                   |       |
| [svelte/no-not-function-handler](./no-not-function-handler)                                           | disallow use of not function in event handler                                                                                          | ‚≠êÔ∏è   |
| [svelte/no-object-in-text-mustaches](./no-object-in-text-mustaches)                                   | disallow objects in text mustache interpolation                                                                                        | ‚≠êÔ∏è   |
| [svelte/no-reactive-reassign](./no-reactive-reassign)                                                 | disallow reassigning reactive values                                                                                                   |       |
| [svelte/no-shorthand-style-property-overrides](./no-shorthand-style-property-overrides)               | disallow shorthand style properties that override related longhand properties                                                          | ‚≠êÔ∏è   |
| [svelte/no-store-async](./no-store-async)                                                             | disallow using async/await inside svelte stores because it causes issues with the auto-unsubscribing features                          |       |
| [svelte/no-unknown-style-directive-property](./no-unknown-style-directive-property)                   | disallow unknown `style:property`                                                                                                      | ‚≠êÔ∏è   |
| [svelte/require-store-callbacks-use-set-param](./require-store-callbacks-use-set-param)               | store callbacks must use `set` param                                                                                                   |       |
| [svelte/require-store-reactive-access](./require-store-reactive-access)                               | disallow to use of the store itself as an operand. Need to use $ prefix or get function.                                               | üîß    |
| [svelte/valid-compile](./valid-compile)                                                               | disallow warnings when compiling.                                                                                                      | ‚≠êÔ∏è   |
| [svelte/valid-prop-names-in-kit-pages](./valid-prop-names-in-kit-pages)                               | disallow props other than data or errors in SvelteKit page components.                                                                 |       |

## Security Vulnerability

These rules relate to security vulnerabilities in Svelte code:

| Rule ID                                     | Description                                                              |     |
| :------------------------------------------ | :----------------------------------------------------------------------- | :-- |
| [svelte/no-at-html-tags](./no-at-html-tags) | disallow use of `{@html}` to prevent XSS attack                          | ‚≠êÔ∏è |
| [svelte/no-target-blank](./no-target-blank) | disallow `target="_blank"` attribute without `rel="noopener noreferrer"` |     |

## Best Practices

These rules relate to better ways of doing things to help you avoid problems:

| Rule ID                                                                         | Description                                                                                                                               |     |
| :------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | :---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | :-- |
| [svelte/block-lang](./block-lang)                                               | disallows the use of languages other than those specified in the configuration for the lang attribute of `<script>` and `<style>` blocks. |     |
| [svelte/button-has-type](./button-has-type)                                     | disallow usage of button without an explicit type attribute                                                                               |     |
| [svelte/no-at-debug-tags](./no-at-debug-tags)                                   | disallow the use of `{@debug}`                                                                                                            | ‚≠êÔ∏è |
| [svelte/no-ignored-unsubscribe](./no-ignored-unsubscribe)                       | disallow ignoring the unsubscribe method returned by the `subscribe()` on Svelte stores.                                                  |     |
| [svelte/no-immutable-reactive-statements](./no-immutable-reactive-statements)   | disallow reactive statements that don't reference reactive values.                                                                        |     |
| [svelte/no-inline-styles](./no-inline-styles)                                   | disallow attributes and directives that produce inline styles                                                                             |     |
| [svelte/no-reactive-functions](./no-reactive-functions)                         | it's not necessary to define functions in reactive statements                                                                             | üí°  |
| [svelte/no-reactive-literals](./no-reactive-literals)                           | don't assign literal values in reactive statements                                                                                        | üí°  |
| [svelte/no-svelte-internal](./no-svelte-internal)                               | svelte/internal will be removed in Svelte 6.                                                                                              |     |
| [svelte/no-unused-class-name](./no-unused-class-name)                           | disallow the use of a class in the template without a corresponding style                                                                 |     |
| [svelte/no-unused-svelte-ignore](./no-unused-svelte-ignore)                     | disallow unused svelte-ignore comments                                                                                                    | ‚≠êÔ∏è |
| [svelte/no-useless-mustaches](./no-useless-mustaches)                           | disallow unnecessary mustache interpolations                                                                                              | üîß  |
| [svelte/prefer-destructured-store-props](./prefer-destructured-store-props)     | destructure values from object stores for better change tracking & fewer redraws                                                          | üí°  |
| [svelte/require-each-key](./require-each-key)                                   | require keyed `{#each}` block                                                                                                             |     |
| [svelte/require-event-dispatcher-types](./require-event-dispatcher-types)       | require type parameters for `createEventDispatcher`                                                                                       |     |
| [svelte/require-optimized-style-attribute](./require-optimized-style-attribute) | require style attributes that can be optimized                                                                                            |     |
| [svelte/require-stores-init](./require-stores-init)                             | require initial value in store                                                                                                            |     |
| [svelte/valid-each-key](./valid-each-key)                                       | enforce keys to use variables defined in the `{#each}` block                                                                              |     |

## Stylistic Issues

These rules relate to style guidelines, and are therefore quite subjective:

| Rule ID                                                                                         | Description                                                                        |     |
| :---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | :--------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | :-- |
| [svelte/derived-has-same-inputs-outputs](./derived-has-same-inputs-outputs)                     | derived store should use same variable names between values and callback           |     |
| [svelte/first-attribute-linebreak](./first-attribute-linebreak)                                 | enforce the location of first attribute                                            | üîß  |
| [svelte/html-closing-bracket-spacing](./html-closing-bracket-spacing)                           | require or disallow a space before tag's closing brackets                          | üîß  |
| [svelte/html-quotes](./html-quotes)                                                             | enforce quotes style of HTML attributes                                            | üîß  |
| [svelte/html-self-closing](./html-self-closing)                                                 | enforce self-closing style                                                         | üîß  |
| [svelte/indent](./indent)                                                                       | enforce consistent indentation                                                     | üîß  |
| [svelte/max-attributes-per-line](./max-attributes-per-line)                                     | enforce the maximum number of attributes per line                                  | üîß  |
| [svelte/mustache-spacing](./mustache-spacing)                                                   | enforce unified spacing in mustache                                                | üîß  |
| [svelte/no-extra-reactive-curlies](./no-extra-reactive-curlies)                                 | disallow wrapping single reactive statements in curly braces                       | üí°  |
| [svelte/no-restricted-html-elements](./no-restricted-html-elements)                             | disallow specific HTML elements                                                    |     |
| [svelte/no-spaces-around-equal-signs-in-attribute](./no-spaces-around-equal-signs-in-attribute) | disallow spaces around equal signs in attribute                                    | üîß  |
| [svelte/prefer-class-directive](./prefer-class-directive)                                       | require class directives instead of ternary expressions                            | üîß  |
| [svelte/prefer-style-directive](./prefer-style-directive)                                       | require style directives instead of style attribute                                | üîß  |
| [svelte/shorthand-attribute](./shorthand-attribute)                                             | enforce use of shorthand syntax in attribute                                       | üîß  |
| [svelte/shorthand-directive](./shorthand-directive)                                             | enforce use of shorthand syntax in directives                                      | üîß  |
| [svelte/sort-attributes](./sort-attributes)                                                     | enforce order of attributes                                                        | üîß  |
| [svelte/spaced-html-comment](./spaced-html-comment)                                             | enforce consistent spacing after the `<!--` and before the `-->` in a HTML comment | üîß  |

## Extension Rules

These rules extend the rules provided by ESLint itself, or other plugins to work well in Svelte:

| Rule ID                                                 | Description                                                   |     |
| :------------------------------------------------------ | :------------------------------------------------------------ | :-- |
| [svelte/no-inner-declarations](./no-inner-declarations) | disallow variable or `function` declarations in nested blocks | ‚≠êÔ∏è |
| [svelte/no-trailing-spaces](./no-trailing-spaces)       | disallow trailing whitespace at the end of lines              | üîß  |

## SvelteKit

These rules relate to SvelteKit and its best Practices.

| Rule ID                                               | Description                                 |     |
| :---------------------------------------------------- | :------------------------------------------ | :-- |
| [svelte/no-goto-without-base](./no-goto-without-base) | disallow using goto() without the base path |     |

## Experimental

‚ö†Ô∏è These rules are considered experimental and may change or be removed in the future:

| Rule ID                                                                           | Description                                                 |     |
| :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | :---------------------------------------------------------- | :-- |
| [svelte/experimental-require-slot-types](./experimental-require-slot-types)       | require slot type declaration using the `$$Slots` interface |     |
| [svelte/experimental-require-strict-events](./experimental-require-strict-events) | require the strictEvents attribute on `<script>` tags       |     |

These rules relate to this plugin works:

| Rule ID                                         | Description                                 |     |
| :---------------------------------------------- | :------------------------------------------ | :-- |
| [svelte/comment-directive](./comment-directive) | support comment-directives in HTML template | ‚≠êÔ∏è |
| [svelte/system](./system)                       | system rule for working this plugin         | ‚≠êÔ∏è |

## Deprecated

- ‚ö†Ô∏è We're going to remove deprecated rules in the next major release. Please migrate to successor/new rules.
- :innocent: We don't fix bugs which are in deprecated rules since we don't have enough resources.

| Rule ID                                                                                             | Replaced by                                                             |
| :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | :---------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [svelte/@typescript-eslint/no-unnecessary-condition](./@typescript-eslint/no-unnecessary-condition) | This rule is no longer needed when using svelte-eslint-parser>=v0.19.0. |
